Digital Marketing

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”7px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”15%” module_alignment=”center” height=”12px” custom_margin=”-20px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600|||on||||” link_text_color=”#ffffff” link_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30px||30px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#000000″]AA Group is the future of digital marketing and is the best digital marketing agency in India. We work efficiently in improvising the business of their clients by providing the best digital marketing services. We help business to generate leads and increase their sales and overall increase their ROI. AA Group is the best place to invest your time and money and get the best results and returns.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”60px|0px|60px|0px|true|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ admin_label=”Services” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Digital Marketing Consulting” image=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Digital-marketing.jpg” icon_alignment=”left” admin_label=”Service” module_class=”jucra_blurb_with_button” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Open Sans|800|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.7em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” body_link_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” background_color=”#1fb6ea” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 20%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”20%” background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|10px|70px|10px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_radii_image=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”]Digital marketing consulting is constantly evaluating your business and get an insight of your returns, sales and much more. This service involves the use of right strategies into the market place to bring maximum customers and generate leads and sales as much possible. Thereby, we work to put in right strategy and efforts to raise the standards of the business.

Get in touch[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Social Media Marketing” image=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Social-media-marketing.jpg” icon_alignment=”left” admin_label=”Service” module_class=”jucra_blurb_with_button” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Open Sans|800|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.7em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” body_link_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” background_color=”#1fb6ea” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 20%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”20%” background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|10px|70px|10px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_radii_image=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”] In the recent times social media has gained the power to flourish and promote business and by this social media marketing is ruling the market. We acknowledge the trend and effectively use it into our services to benefit our clients. We work as social media agency to promote the business at social media handles, increase their reach and engagement to their services and products.

We provide best SEO services and ASO services to work progressively in managing creative, and user-centric websites and apps.

Get in touch[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Email Marketing” image=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Email-marketing.jpg” icon_alignment=”left” admin_label=”Service” module_class=”jucra_blurb_with_button” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Open Sans|800|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.7em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” body_link_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” background_color=”#1fb6ea” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 20%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”20%” background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|10px|70px|10px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_radii_image=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”] Email marketing is an approach to reach potential customers via email. It is used to send commercial message, advertisements and divert customers towards our business. Our team work gradually to ensure maximum response, sales, and promotion of the business.

Paid Ads marketing is the best platform to spend your money and get positive returns. We put the right approach and paid marketing strategies to ensure maximum reach, results and overall growth of your business. Paid channel help you grow fast.

Get in touch[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Content Marketing” image=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Content-Marketing.jpg” icon_alignment=”left” admin_label=”Service” module_class=”jucra_blurb_with_button” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Open Sans|800|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.7em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” body_link_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” background_color=”#1fb6ea” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 20%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”20%” background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|10px|70px|10px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_radii_image=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”]The delivery of right and effective content is necessary to build customers trust into our business. Content marketing helps customers to provide a better view of business, its work, products and services. We understand the importance of content creation and its marketing and continuously work in this direction. We provide content marketing services to our clients and help them to reach the right customers.

Work with a team of talented Digital Marketers

AA Group has one of the best team of digital marketing and we promise to deliver the world-class best service. We help small and medium scale business to raise their sales and lead for their business by increasing the reach to millions of user with our marketing strategies.
